Package org.epochx.life

Interface Summary
ConfigListener Provides the interface to be implemented by objects that wish to listen for configure events.
CrossoverListener Provides the interface to be implemented by objects that wish to handle crossover events.
ElitismListener Provides the interface to be implemented by objects that wish to handle elitism events.
GenerationListener Provides the interface to be implemented by objects that wish to handle generation events.
InitialisationListener Provides the interface to be implemented by objects that wish to handle run events.
MutationListener Provides the interface to be implemented by objects that wish to handle run events.
PoolSelectionListener Provides the interface to be implemented by objects that wish to handle pool selection events.
ReproductionListener Provides the interface to be implemented by objects that wish to handle reproduction events.
RunListener Provides the interface to be implemented by objects that wish to handle run events.
 

Class Summary
ConfigAdapter Provides an abstract implementation of ConfigListener.
CrossoverAdapter Provides an abstract implementation of CrossoverListener.
ElitismAdapter Provides an abstract implementation of ElitismListener.
GenerationAdapter Provides an abstract implementation of GenerationListener.
InitialisationAdapter Provides an abstract implementation of InitialisationListener.
LifeCycleManager The Life Cycle system in EpochX is managed by an instance of this class.
MutationAdapter Provides an abstract implementation of MutationListener.
PoolSelectionAdapter Provides an abstract implementation of PoolSelectionListener.
ReproductionAdapter Provides an abstract implementation of ReproductionListener.
RunAdapter Provides an abstract implementation of RunListener.
